Description.Text: Medea Apartment Hotel & SPA Center is a stylish 3-star property promising spacious accommodation and great facilities, near the heart of Druskininkai. Highlights include a whirlpool and free Wi-Fi. Located on Sveikatos Street, the hotel affords quick and easy access to the main attractions. Guests can experience a pretty spa town with architecture reflecting a varied history, be it Russian, Polish or Lithuanian. There are several museums and art galleries, and cultural events throughout the year. Further afield can be found beautiful parkland and walks along the river. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise set amongst lovely parkland. Facilities include a whirlpool, sauna, steam room, and spa offering a range of body and massage treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. There is no restaurant onsite, but a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Standard rooms are 28sqm and tastefully designed, featuring a bright modern decor and comfortable sofa. Amenities include a flat-screen TV and an en-suite bathroom with shower. Free parking is possible onsite.
